content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® f586 d e s i g n s t u d i o f r e e w i t h y a r n p u r c h a s e baby alpaca grande hand dyed mistake rib stitch hat to fit kids adult approximate circumference 20 21 ½ materials baby alpaca grande hand dyed 1 1 100g skeins color 144 autumn gauge 12 sts 20 row= 4 in mistake rib st on us size 11 8mm knitting needles needles/notions us size 11 8mm -16 circular and dpns 1 st marker m pattern is written for smallest size with larger sizes in parenthesis if only one number is given it applies to all sizes mistake rib stitch multiple of 4 sts round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * round 2 k1 *p2 k2 repeat from * end p2 k1 repeat these 2 rnds for pattern st begin with circular needle long tail co 60 64 sts join in the round and pm work in mistake rib st for 6 7 decrease rnds switch to dpns round 1 *k2 k2tog repeat from * around 45 48 sts round 2 *k1 k2tog repeat from * around 30 32 sts round 3 *k2tog repeat from * around 15 16 sts round 4 k1 0 *k2tog repeat from * around 8 8 sts cut yarn and draw through rem sts weave in all ends ©2014 plymouth yarn company 091514vle designed by vanessa ewing abbreviations beg= begin ning bobble= bind off co= cast on cont= continue decrease= decrease dpns= double pointed needles m= marker pm= place marker psso= pass slipped stitch over p = purl rem= remain ning repeat= repeat round=round rs= right side sl = slip st s = stitch es decrease = together
